This is the main which starts the whole game by calling Game.getInstance(int test).
MainMenu - Class in Model
Menu which the player sees at first in order to decide whether to start a new game, continue the game or to set the music and sound volume.

This is the constructor for the MainMenu to set up everything

MouseInput - Class in Controller
This class indicates when certain mouse buttons are pressed

mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class Model.EscMenu
This method is called whenever the mouse is pressed and checks the position of the mouse click
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class Model.MainMenu
This method is called whenever the mouse is pressed and depending on its position it will do some action or not.
Music - Class in Model
This class is here to play every music and sound effect of the game.
